The rationale behind choosing the range of parameters isthat they reflect the typical range of values observed in real-world scenarios.For example, the income mean is typically between $30,000 and$60,000, sowe chose a range of $30,000-$60,000. The incomedirection change step is typically between 10% and 20%, so we chose a rangeof 10%-20%.The model was implemented using NetLogo, which is a popular platform forimplementing agent-based models. NetLogo is a free and open-source softwareplatform that allows researchers to easily implement and simulate agentbased models. It provides a user-friendly interface that makes it easy tocreate and modify agent-based models. It also provides a large library of built-infunctions and procedures that can be used to create complex agent-basedmodels. NetLogo also supports parallel execution, which means that multiplesimulations can be executed simultaneously. This feature is useful when runninglarge-scale experiments, as it reduces the computational cost of executingmultiple simulations. Finally, NetLogo also supports visualization, which meansthat users can visualize their agent-based models in real-time.
